title: Little Hospital
description:
EXPERIENCE A HOSPITAL
Meet doctors, nurses, dentists and flower shop keepers. Try out the X-ray, drive an ambulance and save some kids after a crash with their skateboards. 
 
DISCOVER & EXPLORE
In Little Hospital kids can discover a busy medical center full
of surprises – from the reception to the operating room and to the X-ray.
Little Hospital is a rich and fun hidden object game optimized for kids. It is all about exploration and discovery: the kids can move freely from one room to another and experience the app in their own speed. The different rooms in the hospital are full of animations and fun little games like painting a casket or puzzles.
 
PERFECT FOR KIDS
The controls are extremely simple: Tap to interact with an object, swipe to navigate into another scene - so even the younger ones can easily navigate through the App.
 
Highlights:
 - Simple controls optimized for kids age 3 - 5
 - 5 unique rooms and plenty of items to search for
 - 2 mini games
 - An ambulance with different rescue missions
 - Collectables and missions to guarantee hours of content and fun
 - Fun characters and hilarious animations
 - Original artwork and music
 - No internet or WiFI needed - Play wherever you want
 
DISCOVER, PLAY, LEARN
Our aspiration is to introduce children to the digital world in a playful and gentle way and thus opening up a complete new world to them.
With our apps, kids are able to step into different shoes, go on adventures and set their creativity free.
 
Little Hospital is handcrafted with love in Berlin, Germany.
